name: Houndoom
flavorText:
If you are burned
by the flames it
shoots from its mouth, the pain
will never go
away.

previous.name: Houndour
previous.flavorText:
It uses different
kinds of cries for
communicating with others of its kind
and for pursuing
its prey.

next.name: Kingdra
next.flavorText:
It is said that it
usually hides in
underwater caves. It can create
whirlpools by
yawning.
